title: Open SSPM Dataset Contract (v1)
description: Dataset contracts define the meaning and row shape of a dataset (key + version + JSON Schema). Connectors provide datasets that conform to these contracts.

schema_version.description: Document schema version discriminator. Must be 1 for Open SSPM v1 documents.

description.description: Optional human-readable description of the dataset.

primary_key.description: Optional JSON Pointer to the primary key field in a dataset row.

recommended_display.description: Optional JSON Pointer to a recommended display field in a dataset row (e.g. name).

schema.description: JSON Schema object describing a single dataset row.
